item.title: v3.18.3更新日誌：調整儲存、模型優化、新增功能
item.itunes:title: v3.18.3更新日誌：調整儲存、模型優化、新增功能
item.itunes:author: github-actions[bot]
item.itunes:summary:
What's Changed

  • Move plan/act model settings to global storage by @celestial-vault in #4636
  • Strip thinking tokens from Cerebras reasoning model inputs by @kevint-cerebras in #4635
  • Improve Claude Code handling by @BarreiroT in #4619
  • add log + run options by @0xToshii in #4630
  • v3.18.3 Release Notes by @github-actions in #4644

item.title: v3.18.2 更新：Claude 4 登場、多項功能修復與優化
item.itunes:title: v3.18.2 更新：Claude 4 登場、多項功能修復與優化
item.itunes:author: github-actions[bot]
item.itunes:summary:
What's Changed

  • Add Claude 4 model to SAP AI Core Provider by @lizzzcai in #4418
  • [SettingsView.tsx] Extract About Section by @celestial-vault in #4537
  • not awaiting async functions in controller by @0xToshii in #4583
  • Splitting chat view into multiple modular files by @arafatkatze in #4569
  • Cleanup: Remove unused property postMessageToWebview from Task by @sjf in #4587
  • Replace uses of workspaceFolders from the vscode SDK with the host bridge by @sjf in #4589
  • Replace vscode workspaceFolders with getCwd which uses the host bridge. by @sjf in #4593
  • adding distance metric safety check to the block-apply, for eval by @0xToshii in #4477
  • RIPping out latex support by @pashpashpash in #4595
  • fixing closing telemetry banner by @pashpashpash in #4597
  • deleting mermaid prompts by @pashpashpash in #4596
  • [LiteLLM] Group multiple requests into a single session using litellm_session_id parameter by @jorgegarciarey in #4457
  • [PROTOBUS] showTextDocument host bridge by @Garoth in #4586
  • Cleanup: Remove unused params from the ToolExecutor constructor. by @sjf in #4588
  • Remove unused param cwd by @sjf in #4602
  • fix: Do not read auth variables from the user env when using Claude Code by @BarreiroT in #4591
  • Fixing Bugs in ChatView with Primary/Secondary Buttons and related issues by @arafatkatze in #4553
  • Remove unused file get-python-env.ts by @sjf in #4604
  • Cleanup: Remove unused property and param postMessage from ClineAccountService by @sjf in #4620
  • adding unique remote git urls to context on first message env variables by @pashpashpash in #4622
  • Use the host bridge to get the cwd in autoApprove.ts by @sjf in #4601
  • add cline.walkthrough to command handler by @kevinneung in #4621
  • Fall back to getting current terminal content when shell integration API fails to return output by @saoudrizwan in #4605
  • edge case handling in diff-apply by @0xToshii in #4600
  • Confirmation popup when deleting tasks by @canvrno in #4627
  • [SettingsView] [ApiConfig Section] save on change by @celestial-vault in #4554
  • feat: Introduce Thinking Budget customization for Claude Code by @BarreiroT in #4618
  • Adding a troubleshooting guide for terminal problems by @arafatkatze in #4592
  • setting claude 4 as best model by @pashpashpash in #4637
  • v3.18.2 Release Notes by @github-actions in #4581

New Contributors

  • @lizzzcai made their first contribution in #4418

Full Changelog: v3.18.1...v3.18.2

item.title: v3.18.1版本更新：新增Claude 4 Sonnet、移除Gemini並修復錯誤
item.itunes:title: v3.18.1版本更新：新增Claude 4 Sonnet、移除Gemini並修復錯誤
item.itunes:author: github-actions[bot]
item.itunes:summary:
What's Changed

  • Add support for Claude 4 Sonnet in SAP AI Core provider (Thanks @GTxx!)
  • Fix ENAMETOOLONG error when using Claude Code provider with long conversation histories (Thanks @BarreiroT!)
  • Remove Gemini CLI provider because Google asked us to
  • Fix bug with "Delete All Tasks" functionality

New Contributors

  • @smilefisher made their first contribution in #3635
  • @GTxx made their first contribution in #4448

Full Changelog: v3.18.0...v3.18.1

item.title: Cline v3.18.0 更新：優化Claude/Gemini支援 新增Gemini免費CLI取用
item.itunes:title: Cline v3.18.0 更新：優化Claude/Gemini支援 新增Gemini免費CLI取用
item.itunes:author: github-actions[bot]
item.itunes:summary:
What's Changed

  • Optimized Cline to work with the Claude 4 family of models, resulting in improved performance, reliability, and new capabilities
  • Added a new Gemini CLI provider that allows you to use your local Gemini CLI authentication to access Gemini models for free (Thanks @google-gemini!)
  • Optimized Cline to work with the Gemini 2.5 family of models
  • Updated the default and recommended model to Claude 4 Sonnet for the best performance
  • Fix race condition in Plan/Act mode switching
  • Improve robustness of search and replace parsing

Full Changelog: v3.17.16...v3.18.0

  • Improve robustness of search and replace parsing

item.title: v3.17.16 更新：修復 Claude 錯誤處理與新增 API 請求追蹤
item.itunes:title: v3.17.16 更新：修復 Claude 錯誤處理與新增 API 請求追蹤
item.itunes:author: github-actions[bot]
item.itunes:summary:
What's Changed

  • Fix Claude Code provider error handling for incomplete messages during long-running tasks (Thanks @BarreiroT!)
  • Add taskId as metadata to LiteLLM API requests for better request tracing (Thanks @jorgegarciarey!)

New Contributors

  • @hoodand made their first contribution in #4056
  • @Algentile made their first contribution in #4147

item.title: v3.17.15 更新：修復Provider、UI問題，提升無障礙支援
item.itunes:title: v3.17.15 更新：修復Provider、UI問題，提升無障礙支援
item.itunes:author: github-actions[bot]
item.itunes:summary:
What's Changed

  • Fix LiteLLM provider to properly respect selected model IDs when switching between Plan and Act modes (Thanks @sammcj!)
  • Fix chat input being cleared when switching between Plan/Act modes without sending a message (Thanks @BarreiroT!)
  • Fix MCP server name display to avoid showing "undefined" for SSE servers, preventing tool/resource invocation failures (Thanks @ramybenaroya!)
  • Fix AWS Bedrock provider by removing deprecated custom model encoding (Thanks @watany-dev!)
  • Fix timeline tooltips for followup messages and improve color retrieval code (Thanks @char8x!)
  • Improve accessibility by making task header buttons properly announced by screen readers (Thanks @yncat!)
  • Improve accessibility by adding proper state reporting for Plan/Act mode switch for screen readers (Thanks @yncat!)
  • Prevent reading development environment variables from user's environment (Thanks @BarreiroT!)

New Contributors

  • @SmartManoj made their first contribution in #4251
  • @yncat made their first contribution in #4246
  • @char8x made their first contribution in #4164
  • @ryan-nauman made their first contribution in #3779
  • @ramybenaroya made their first contribution in #3840
  • @rikaaa0928 made their first contribution in #4282

Full Changelog: v3.17.14...v3.17.15

What's Changed

  • Fix chat input being cleared when switching between Plan/Act modes without sending a message (Thanks @BarreiroT!)
  • Fix MCP server name display to avoid showing "undefined" for SSE servers, preventing tool/resource invocation failures (Thanks @ramybenaroya!)

item.title: Cline v3.17.14 新增Claude Code/SAP AI Core API，多項設定及修正上線
item.itunes:title: Cline v3.17.14 新增Claude Code/SAP AI Core API，多項設定及修正上線
item.itunes:author: github-actions[bot]
item.itunes:summary:
What's Changed

  • Add Claude Code as a new API provider, allowing integration with Anthropic's Claude Code CLI tool and Claude Max Plan (Thanks @BarreiroT!)
  • Add SAP AI Core as a new API provider with support for Claude and GPT models (Thanks @schardosin!)
  • Add configurable default terminal profile setting, allowing users to specify which terminal Cline should use (Thanks @valinha!)
  • Add terminal output size constraint setting to limit how much terminal output is processed
  • Add MCP Rich Display settings to the settings page for persistent configuration (Thanks @Vl4diC0de!)
  • Improve copy button functionality with refactored reusable components (Thanks @shouhanzen!)
  • Improve AWS Bedrock provider by removing deprecated dependency and using standard AWS SDK (Thanks @watany-dev!)
  • Fix list_files tool to properly return files when targeting hidden directories
  • Fix search and replace edge case that could cause file deletion, making the algorithm more lenient for models using different diff formats
  • Fix task restoration issues that could occur when resuming interrupted tasks
  • Fix checkpoint saving to properly track all file changes
  • Improve file context warnings to reduce diff edit errors when resuming restored tasks
  • Clear chat input when switching between Plan/Act modes within a task
  • Exclude .clinerules files from checkpoint tracking

New Contributors

  • @Vl4diC0de made their first contribution in #4029
  • @friedmud made their first contribution in #4114
  • @schardosin made their first contribution in #3980
  • @rameshvr made their first contribution in #3935

Full Changelog: v3.17.13...v3.17.14-a

  • Add SAP AI Core as a new API provider with support for Claude and GPT models (Thanks @schardosin!)

  • Add SAP AI Core as a new API provider with support for Claude and GPT models (Thanks @schardosin!)
  • Add configurable default terminal profile setting, allowing users to specify which terminal Cline should use (Thanks @valinha!)

item.title: v3.17.13 版本推出：新增 Gemini 思考 UX，強化 AI 功能及平台體驗
item.itunes:title: v3.17.13 版本推出：新增 Gemini 思考 UX，強化 AI 功能及平台體驗
item.itunes:author: github-actions[bot]
item.itunes:summary:
What's Changed

  • Add Thinking UX for Gemini models, providing visual feedback during model reasoning
  • Add support for Notifications MCP integration with Cline
  • Add prompt caching indicator for Grok 3 models
  • Sort MCP marketplace by newest listings by default for easier discovery of recent servers
  • Update O3 model family pricing to reflect latest OpenAI rates
  • Remove '-beta' suffix from Grok model identifiers
  • Fix AWS Bedrock provider by removing deprecated Anthropic-Bedrock SDK (Thanks @watany-dev!)
  • Fix menu display issue for terminal timeout settings
  • Improve chat input field styling and behavior

Full Changelog: v3.17.12...v3.17.13

  • Add support for Notifications MCP integration with Cline

item.title: Cline v3.17.12 更新：免費 Grok 3 模型上線，介面與錯誤修復
item.itunes:title: Cline v3.17.12 更新：免費 Grok 3 模型上線，介面與錯誤修復
item.itunes:author: github-actions[bot]
item.itunes:summary:
What's Changed

  • Free Grok Model Available! Access Grok 3 completely free through the Cline provider
  • Add collapsible MCP response panels to keep conversations focused on the main AI responses while still allowing access to detailed MCP output (Thanks @valinha!)
  • Prioritize active files (open tabs) at the top of the file context menu when using @ mentions (Thanks @abeatrix!)
  • Fix context menu to properly default to "File" option instead of incorrectly selecting "Git Commits"
  • Fix diff editing to handle out-of-order SEARCH/REPLACE blocks, improving reliability with models that don't follow strict ordering
  • Fix telemetry warning popup appearing repeatedly for users who have telemetry disabled

New Contributors

  • @abeatrix made their first contribution in #4048
  • @valinha made their first contribution in #3528

Full Changelog: v3.17.11...v3.17.12
item.description:
What's Changed

  • Free Grok Model Available! Access Grok 3 completely free through the Cline provider
  • Add collapsible MCP response panels to keep conversations focused on the main AI responses while still allowing access to detailed MCP output (Thanks @valinha!)
  • Prioritize active files (open tabs) at the top of the file context menu when using @ mentions (Thanks @abeatrix!)
  • Fix context menu to properly default to "File" option instead of incorrectly selecting "Git Commits"
  • Fix diff editing to handle out-of-order SEARCH/REPLACE blocks, improving reliability with models that don't follow strict ordering
  • Fix telemetry warning popup appearing repeatedly for users who have telemetry disabled

New Contributors

  • @abeatrix made their first contribution in #4048
  • @valinha made their first contribution in #3528

Full Changelog: v3.17.11...v3.17.12
item.content:encoded:
What's Changed

  • Free Grok Model Available! Access Grok 3 completely free through the Cline provider
  • Add collapsible MCP response panels to keep conversations focused on the main AI responses while still allowing access to detailed MCP output (Thanks @valinha!)
  • Prioritize active files (open tabs) at the top of the file context menu when using @ mentions (Thanks @abeatrix!)
  • Fix context menu to properly default to "File" option instead of incorrectly selecting "Git Commits"
  • Fix diff editing to handle out-of-order SEARCH/REPLACE blocks, improving reliability with models that don't follow strict ordering
  • Fix telemetry warning popup appearing repeatedly for users who have telemetry disabled

New Contributors

  • @abeatrix made their first contribution in #4048
  • @valinha made their first contribution in #3528

Full Changelog: v3.17.11...v3.17.12
